definitions.definition: A six-point score occurring when the ball enters possession of a team 's player in the opponent 's end zone .
examples: Today I scored my first touchdown .

definitions.definition: A defensive action of grounding the ball in the team 's own in-goal to stop the play .
A try ( scoring play of grounding the ball in the opposing team's in-goal ) .
The moment when an aircraft or spacecraft makes first or final contact with the ground during a landing .
examples: The passengers audibly relaxed at touchdown .

definitions.definition: The moment of contact of a tornado with the ground .

main_definition: ( American football , Canadian football ) A six-point score occurring when the ball enters possession of a team 's player in the opponent 's end zone .
secondary_definitions: ( rugby ) A defensive action of grounding the ball in the team 's own in-goal to stop the play .
( rugby ) A try ( scoring play of grounding the ball in the opposing team's in-goal ) .
( aviation ) The moment when an aircraft or spacecraft makes first or final contact with the ground during a landing .
The moment of contact of a tornado with the ground .
